search.query: * $application_control$ | spath log_source | search log_source!="NULL" | spath log_source |timechart count by log_source

* $requests_control$ | spath log_source | search log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.request" | spath return_status | search return_status="5*" | timechart count by return_status
* $requests_control$ | spath log_source | search log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.request" | spath return_status | timechart count by return_status

* $requests_control$ | spath log_source | search log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.request" | spath request_url | search request_url="/api/docker/*" | spath repo | search repo!="NULL" | spath image | search image!="NULL" | spath repo | search repo!="latest" | spath image | timechart count by image

* $requests_control$ | spath log_source | search log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.request" | spath request_url | search request_url="/api/docker/*" | spath repo | search repo!="NULL" | spath image | search image!="NULL" | spath repo | search repo!="latest" | spath request_content_length | eval gb=request_content_length/1073741824 | spath repo | stats sum(gb) by repo

* $requests_control$ | spath log_source | search log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.request" | spath response_content_length | search response_content_length!="-1" | eval gb=response_content_length/1073741824| spath remote_address | stats sum(gb) as upload_size by remote_address | top limit=10 remote_address,upload_size | fields - count,percent

* $requests_control$ | spath log_source | search log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.request" | spath request_content_length | search request_content_length!="-1" | spath request_content_length | eval gb=request_content_length/1073741824 | spath remote_address | stats sum(gb) as download_size by remote_address | top limit=10 remote_address,download_size | fields - count,percent

* $audit_control$ | spath log_source | search log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.access"| spath action_response | search action_response="DENIED*" | spath ip | stats count by ip

table.title: Denied Logins By Username and IP

search.query: * $audit_control$ | spath log_source | search log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.access"| spath action_response | search action_response="DENIED LOGIN" | spath ip | spath username | search username!="NA " | spath username | stats count by ip,username
* $audit_control$ | spath log_source | search log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.access"| spath action_response | search action_response="ACCEPTED DEPLOY" | spath username | stats count by username
